channel.title: Publisher: Pinter Publishers on
channel.description: Recent content in Publisher: Pinter Publishers on

item.title: States and Markets
item.description: Although subtitled ‘An Introduction…’ to IPE, this represents the only book length discussion of Strange’s theory of the four dimensions of power in IPE. It is at once an introduction to the subject and a forceful agenda setting exercise for further research. As such, though often appearing on undergraduate course reading lists, this is Strange’s defining book, one about which the rest of her work revolves. Strange discusses her ideas on theory building and methodology as well as the four structures of power in the international political economy: security, finance, production and knowledge.
